name: Mirror's Edge: Pure Time Trials Map Pack
name_original: Mirror's Edge: Pure Time Trials Map Pack
description:
Mirror's Edge: Pure Time Trials Map Pack is a game developed by Electronic Arts DICE. It came out on 19-02-2009. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Mirror's Edge: Pure Time Trials Map Pack on PC and PlayStation 3.
